snippet: After years of trying to curb the power of school boards, some advocates of overhaul are backing board candidates in the hope that they will support their causes.
abstract: Much of attention in Los Angeles mayoral primary will be on three races for school board, battling involving mayor, teachers’ union and host of advocates from across nation who have poured millions of dollars into the races; outcome of fight for school board seats will have profound impact on direction of nation’s second-largest school district, and is test case of sorts for those who want to overhaul public education.
lead_paragraph: After years of trying to curb the power of school boards, some advocates of overhaul are backing board candidates in the hope that they will support their causes.

headline.seo: Los Angeles School Board Race Attracts National Attention and Money
headline.main: National Attention and Cash in Los Angeles School Vote
headline.print_headline: National Attention and Cash in Los Angeles School Vote
